name: The Latino Commission
description: For 28 years, the Latino Commission (TLC) has worked within the Latino community providing culturally rooted healing interventions for individuals and families. With bilingual Spanish-speaking staff who are mostly living in recovery, TLC seeks to heal the individual in all aspects of his or her addiction or disorder.
